OBJECTIVES
Actively studying new thing and accumulating essential experience to
prepare for further career path. I hope to become a director of one
department shortly after graduating from university within three years.
The enterprise might not be a big company or a corporation, but it must
be the place I can present myself or use my knowledge, skills.
EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 3
Current Level: Experienced (Non - Manager)
 11/2018 - Now : Sales & leasing executive - Advantage
property services limited company
-Collecting guest's request and introducing them properties with useful
information. 
-Being professional and active in selling and leasing services. 
-Setting up and implementing marketing plans on various platforms such
as Facebook, Zalo, specialised websites,...Also check and evalute their
effeciency. 
- Achieving key performance indicator set up by company.
 7/2018 - 8/2018 : Receptionist/ the same time as working
at hotel - Penstudio Tay Ho
-Receiving guests' information and take them to apartments in order to
view, to support salesmen. 
- Ensuring the stable status of assigned areas, quality of furniture. 
- Making report every week about the number of customer dispatch. 
- Other tasks following head of department.
 5/2017 - 11/2018 : Receptionist - Bounty hotel
Receptionist at a three-star hotel with responsibility of check-in, check-
out, recognising customer’s use of hotel’s services( minibar, laundry,
restaurant, transport service,...), alarming, reporting customer’s stay,
collaborating with other departments, direction, answering customer’s
inquiry,…
 8/2016 - 5/2017 : Trainer - Fitness center
Personal-trainer at a local fitness centre with responsibility of telling
about centre’s services and guiding customers basic and advanced
exercises to gain expected results.
 Completion date 5-2019
Bachelor - Electric Power University
Hospitality management
EDUCATION
Highest Degree Level: Bachelor
-Excellent graduation
-Output valedictorian
